Summary: Unsupported error on array of file descriptors
Description:
The following code:
module test;
   integer f [1:0];
   
   initial begin
      f[0] = $fopen("test.txt", "r");
   end
endmodule

Results in the following error:
%Error-UNSUPPORTED: test.sv:6:14: Unsupported: $fopen/$fclose/$f* descriptor must be a simple variable
    6 |       f[0] = $fopen("test.txt", "r");
      |              ^~~~~~
                    ... For error description see https://verilator.org/warn/UNSUPPORTED?v=4.214
%Error: Exiting due to 1 error(s)
        ... See the manual at https://verilator.org/verilator_doc.html for more assistance.

Is there any workaround for this that doesn't involve defining a separate integer per file descriptor or a potential fix?
